Plot: Dr. Paul Kersey is an experienced trauma surgeon, a man who has spent his life saving lives. After an attack on his family, Paul embarks on his own mission for justice.
Title: Death Wish
Writer: Joe Carnahan (screenplay by), Brian Garfield (from the novel by), Wendell Mayes (based on the 1974 motion picture by)
Actors: Bruce Willis, Vincent D'Onofrio, Elisabeth Shue, Camila Morrone
